structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
State Superintendent Of Buildings, And State House

law.text: [ Text of section effective until October 31, 2012. For text effective October 31, 2012, see below.] The superintendent of state office buildings may, with the approval of the commissioner of administration, appoint such clerks, engineers, electricians, firemen, oilers, mechanics, elevator operators, janitors, cleaners and other persons as may be necessary to enable him to perform his duties. Chapter 8: Appointment of employees [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 139, Sec. 13 effective October 31, 2012. See 2012, 139, Sec. 219. For text effective until October 31, 2012, see above.] The superintendent of the state house may appoint such clerks, engineers, electricians, firemen, oilers, mechanics, elevator operators, janitors, cleaners and other persons as may be necessary to enable him to perform his duties.
